CustomField.defaultValue: "EVENT, ERROR, INTEGRATION, DATABASE, PROCESS, ALERT, OTHER"
CustomField.description: Enter a list of categories of log entries that should fire a platform event. Spelling matters! Choose from: EVENT, ERROR, INTEGRATION, DATABASE, PROCESS, ALERT, OTHER
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a list of categories of log entries that should fire a platform event. Spelling matters! Choose from: EVENT, ERROR, INTEGRATION, DATABASE, PROCESS, ALERT, OTHER
CustomField.label: Categories firing Platform Events
